summary:
Today we’re launching a new feature at Fastmail: memos. 
Add a memo to an email to jot down private notes — remind yourself of tasks, record when you paid a bill, capture notes from a side conversation, or anything else. 
Your memo will stay stuck to the top of the email, so you won’t forget...
title: Introducing memos: stick private notes on your email
